rooms.room_name: Entrance Hall and Living Room Area

dimensions.description: A spacious living area incorporating traditional Kerala aesthetics with stone finishes, wooden beams, and a large central hearth area. The space includes floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side to capture morning light following Vastu principles.
A modern kitchen with traditional Kerala motifs, integrated storage and a dining table area adjacent to the living room.
A dedicated space connecting the main building with a two-car garage area located outside the primary structure.

features: Security and Storage for outdoor gear

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style wooden door with intricate carvings, designed to face the favorable east direction as per Vastu.
Multiple large windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, aligned with east and north directions.

dimensions.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony, traditional Kerala-style wall decor and floor-to-ceiling windows on the south for an unobstructed view.
A guest room with a serene ambiance, incorporating elements of Kerala architecture.
An open-plan studio apartment blending living, dining, and workspace with minimalist Kerala influences.

openings.description: A door leading to a private balcony, designed for privacy and natural ventilation.

dimensions.description: A expansive rooftop terrace with landscaped garden, seating areas, and a traditional Kerala-style pergola, offering panoramic views.
